name: Candy Creed Story: Sweet Assassin
description:
Introducing an all,new kind of match,3 puzzle game! Candy Blast , Sweet Blossom combines puzzle,solving and jewel like matching fun .

It's time to take your sweet puzzle solving to the limit in this unique match,3 candy puzzle game

candy blast match is a free fall 3 match lovely casual game.

Swap and slide lovely candies on the board, arrange candies into matching groups of three or more to collect.

Chain reaction could happen when empty spaces are filled in. The longer the chain, the higher the score you can get in one shot.
